properties.areaDesc: Chesapeake Bay from Drum Point MD to Smith Point VA; Tangier Sound and the inland waters surrounding Bloodsworth Island
properties.headline: Marine Weather Statement issued January 5 at 9:29AM EST by NWS Baltimore MD/Washington DC
properties.description:
Near gale force gusts are possible the remainder of the morning
hours over the lower Chesapeake Bay waters south of Drum Point, as
well as Tangier Sound and the inland waters surrounding
Bloodsworth Island. Small Craft Advisory conditions are expected
to persist this afternoon before winds diminish this evening.
Mariners should avoid navigating these areas. A Small Craft
Advisory remains in effect through this afternoon.

NWSheadline: NEAR GALE FORCE WIND GUSTS POSSIBLE THIS MORNING
